name: Philosoma
overview: Communication Interrupt Message Follows Alpha Priority Distress . Repeat. Priority Distress ORA-194-220 . {Break} Installation Under ATT {Break} Unkown Source. Attention - Crew of UNF Galant All Strega Pilots Prepare To Launch Mission: Break Through Enemy Lines And Neutralize Unknown Threat - Incredible cinematic sequences sterr you into this Alien-Infested battle zone - Experience a variety of perspectives with top-down. Isometric and in-your-face front/back views - Intense Gameplay with 18 different phases and an arsenal of full-range weapons - Strategic maneuvers and tactics will be your only kep to surviving this deadly mission.
